text: Juan de Dios Castro Lozano (25 March 1942 – 24 November 2020) was a Mexican lawyer and politician. He was a member of the National Action Party. He was a member of the Congress of the Union between 1979 to 1985, 1991 to 2000 and 2003 to 2006. Castro Lozano was born in Torreón, Coahuila. He also was President of the Chamber of Deputies from 2003 to 2004. Castro Lozano died on 24 November 2020 from COVID-19 in Mexico City, aged 78.Muere el panista Juan de Dios Castro Lozano ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico City Category:Mexican lawyers
title: Juan de Dios Castro Lozano
